titleInfo.title: Data Publication for "3-D structure of the Glasma initial state: Breaking boost-invariance by collisions of extended shock waves in classical Yang-Mills theory"

mods.abstract: Data Publication for "3-D structure of the Glasma initial state -- Breaking boost-invariance by collisions of extended shock waves in classical Yang-Mills theory", published in Phys. Rev. D 103, 014003 available at arXiv:2010.11172 Contains data and scripts for the plots.
